page.description: ON_APPLICATION_EXIT() executes the Code_String when Alpha Anywhere closes.

argument.name: code
argument.description: A character string that can be interpreted as Xbasic or Xdialog commands.

section.title: Example
section.description: Both the following examples display the following dialog box.
The first example defines Xdialog code that is executed.
section.example: dim code as C Code = Ui_msg_box("Goodbye","It was nice seeing you") %code% on_application_exit(code)

section.description: The second example defines Xbasic code that is executed.
section.example: dim code as C code = "ui_msg_box(" + quote("Goodbye") + ", " + quote("It was nice seeing you") + ")" on_application_exit(code)
